review:
********** ** **** ***** **** *** *** *** After good 8 years of my marriage, I am blessed to have twin babies after my IVF treatment done at MAX Hospital Patparganj. *** ** * ********* ******, always polite with patients and really helpful in making us understand the whole procedure. I still can't forget the day when I heard from her --"Its Positive".

Thankyou so much doctor.

Cancelled the appointment and asked her to visit her the next day. 
Next day, we went to the hospital, she asked us to take a new appointment and cancel the existing one. 
Worse - She doesn't gets herself involved at all. Everything is to be done through the receptionist.
When we were trying to clarify, she didn't even listen to us, not even looked at us, not even at the receptionist. Just looked at the printout of our booking, made a face and then instructed the receptionist to tell us to re-do the booking.
Moreover, a staff person told us that she frequently reschedules her appointments unless she has ample patient on a day.

** ***** **** ** ** ********** **** **** ** *************** * ************** ******* ** ****** *** ******* *** ***

Very mean and non empathatic doc, i visited her and spoke to her about the cost of ivf and she gave a rough without explaining anything.***** ******** ** ***** *** ** ** ****** *** **** ***** ** ***** * **** ***** **** * **** ** ****

I came to under Dr surveen when I got married to 13 years and mostly 4 to 5 times IVF faliure. we came faliure in CMC   THIS hospital very famous in India. I came and same day t Frist visit and do tretement for IVF.so in Frist time under Dr Surveen my wife has been pregnent. and gt twine daughter. many many thanks to Dr Surveen and hr team
Can trust blindly after going to Dr. Sindhu. She was my doctor and surgeon through my IVF process. Very patient, and knows what she is doing.
She looked and heard everything patiently and explained everything in detail. It was overall a good experience.
